title: The client first turns black then freezes in champ select
body: First my friend Vukota then me(vinsmoke) dropped out of champion select,we lost LP for ''dodging'' but the client turned black and then froze totaly and a window appeared saying that the program is not responding...we would like to get our hardly worked for 3 LP back :PP and ofcourse to get this bug fixed so it doesn't happen to anyone else..Im sorry I didn't screenshot the bug when it happend but I am sure we won't be the only ones to whom this happens

replies.body: Verify the game install, always run it as admin. You wont get your LP back, trust me.
